mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, John Augustine Washington III to Ann Pamela Cunningham, 1858 March 13
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Washington, John Augustine, III, 1821-1861
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letter from John Augustine Washington III to Ann Pamela Cunningham, March 13, 1858. Mount Vernon. Receives her letter on defeat of Bill in Virginia Legislature for purchase of Mount Vernon and renewal of Association's offer to purchase Estate. Experience of last 7 years convinces J.A. Washington that neither US nor Virginia wishes to purchase Mount Vernon. He is now willing to consider his 3rd choice for guardianship of estate and asks Association for terms of their offer.
